title: COVID-19 Tracker
description: Visualizing global COVID-19 cases by country. A bit late to the party, but may unfortunately come in handy as we enter a second wave.

title: BikeSafe
description: Building a MERN stack application for visualizing bike-friendly areas in Toronto.

title: NBA Shot Visualizer
description: I like basketball. So, I put together a web-app that helps you visualize your favourite player's best (or worst) shot regions.

title: Netflix UI Overhaul
description: Netflix's UI is solid. I just wanted to see if I could play around and make it a little better. I try and translate some great wireframes I found on Dribbble into a usable, responsive interface.

title: Gait Cycle Analysis for Parkinson's Patients
description: Did some real-time signal processing to identify freezing points in the gait cycle for Parkinson's patients. Provided them with an auditory cue to get back on track.
